column5: ....Okay so I'm planning on heading to Lake Erie for some perch in the morning. My problem is two fold.  One, how do I get to the boat launch in Crystal Beach?  Two, is it possible to get minnows in that area or along the way in the wee hours (7'ish) of the morning?
qew to netherby rd go west away from the upper turn left on stevensville rd it changes names but just stay on it it takes you right to the turn for the launch  finess minnows work
get yourself a dip net and scoop your 120 somewhere along the line
